#### Start by configuring TEAM Mentor 4.0.
The simple configuration file is located in ```TM40\TM\config\SiteData\TM```
~~~ { "tm_design": { "jade_Compilation_Enabled": true, "folder_Docs_Json" : "../../data/Lib_Docs-json", "folder_Jade_Files" : "../../code/TM_Jade", "webServices" : "https://www36.teammentor.net/Aspx_Pages/TM_WebServices.asmx", "port" : 10001 }, "tm_graph": { "folder_Lib_UNO_Json" : "../../data/Lib_UNO-json", "port" : 10002 } } ~~~
- Open the ```tm.config``` file Here you only need to edit the line that says ```webServices ``` - Change the URL to the TM36 URL you configured in the settup of TM36 Backend section. - Change the port for both tm_design and tm_graph to something meaningful. You will need this later.
#### Set up components as services
* Open the Git Bash as Administrator * Navigate to your ```TM40\TM\``` directory * Issue ```$ ./bin/winInstallSrvc.sh``` and follow the prompts * Start the services for the first time using ```./bin/winTM.sh start```
The services will autostart at reboot.
Continue by going through [Installing Reverse Proxy](33cebe6d-c4ac-4ac8-b047-f8f07f5df2e9)
